name: The Errol Flip
description: A coffee stout and whiskey flip from Adrian Biggs of Descarga in Los Angeles.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add whiskey and beer and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a 2 cup jar. Add egg and sugar. Blend with immersion blender until light and frothy. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with nutmeg.
